text: kēāṭṭakeṭṭiya paṭṭaṇaṅṅaḷil veccēā matilukaḷuṭe pinnil ninnēā allāte avar orumicc niṅṅaḷēāṭ yud'dhaṁ ceyyukayilla. avar tam'mil tanneyuḷḷa pēārāṭṭaṁ kaṭuttatākunnu. avar orumiccāṇenn nī vicārikkunnu. avaruṭe hr̥dayaṅṅaḷ bhinnippilākunnu. avar cinticcu manas'silākkātta oru janatayāyat keāṇṭatre at‌
